statements: SELECT * FROM task_aggregations WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT aggregation_result, dataset_name FROM task_aggregations WHERE aggregation_type = 'SUM';
SELECT task_id, aggregation_type FROM task_aggregations WHERE aggregation_result > 100.00;
SELECT aggregation_type, COUNT(*) FROM task_aggregations GROUP BY aggregation_type;
SELECT * FROM task_aggregations WHERE dataset_name LIKE '%sales%';
SELECT * FROM task_aggregations WHERE aggregation_type = 'SUM' ORDER BY aggregation_result DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT task_id, dataset_name FROM task_aggregations WHERE dataset_name LIKE 'data%' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT aggregation_type FROM task_aggregations WHERE aggregation_result > 1000;
SELECT task_id, dataset_name, aggregation_result FROM task_aggregations WHERE task_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY dataset_name ASC, task_id DESC;
SELECT aggregation_type, AVG(aggregation_result) AS average_result FROM task_aggregations GROUP BY aggregation_type HAVING AVG(aggregation_result) > 5000 ORDER BY average_result DESC;
SELECT task_name, dataset_size FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT task_name, completed FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Data%';
SELECT task_name, dataset_size, completed FROM tasks WHERE dataset_size > 100 ORDER BY dataset_size ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*), aggregate_function, SUM(result) FROM aggregates GROUP BY aggregate_function HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY aggregate_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, dataset_size, completed FROM tasks WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT task_id, task_name, dataset_size FROM tasks ORDER BY dataset_size DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, completed FROM tasks WHERE dataset_size > 1000 AND completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM aggregates WHERE aggregate_function = 'SUM' ORDER BY result DESC;
SELECT task_id, aggregate_function, result FROM aggregates JOIN tasks ON aggregates.task_id = tasks.task_id WHERE dataset_size > 500 AND completed = TRUE;
SELECT task_name, data_size FROM TaskAggregations;
SELECT * FROM DatasetDetails WHERE date_created > '2021-01-01';
SELECT task_id, aggregation_result FROM TaskAggregations WHERE dataset_id = 1001;
SELECT task_name, data_size, aggregation_result FROM TaskAggregations ORDER BY data_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM AggregationLog WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT task_name, aggregation_result FROM TaskAggregations WHERE dataset_id = 1 ORDER BY aggregation_result DESC;
SELECT task_name, dataset_name, aggregation_result FROM TaskAggregations JOIN DatasetDetails ON TaskAggregations.dataset_id = DatasetDetails.dataset_id WHERE data_size > 1000 AND success = true;
SELECT * FROM AggregationLog WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, aggregation_result FROM TaskAggregations WHERE data_size < 500 ORDER BY task_name ASC, aggregation_result DESC;

SELECT TaskAggregations.task_name, AggregationLog.timestamp, AggregationLog.success FROM TaskAggregations JOIN AggregationLog ON TaskAggregations.task_id = AggregationLog.task_id WHERE AggregationLog.success = true AND TaskAggregations.data_size > 500 ORDER BY AggregationLog.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Aggregates;
SELECT task_name, result FROM Aggregates WHERE dataset_name = 'dataset1';
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Task%';
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM Datasets ORDER BY dataset_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM Aggregates;
SELECT task_name, dataset_name, result FROM Aggregates WHERE dataset_name = 'Dataset1';
SELECT id, task_name, dataset_name, result FROM Aggregates ORDER BY result DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM Datasets WHERE dataset_size > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM task_metrics;
SELECT task_name, task_status, execution_time FROM task_metrics;
SELECT * FROM dataset_info WHERE dataset_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM dataset_info WHERE dataset_size > 1000;
SELECT log_id, task_id, log_time, log_message FROM task_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM task_metrics WHERE task_status = 'completed';
SELECT task_name, execution_time FROM task_metrics WHERE execution_time > 100 ORDER BY execution_time DESC;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_owner FROM dataset_info WHERE dataset_size > 1000 AND dataset_owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM task_logs WHERE task_id = 100 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT aggregate_name, aggregate_function, result_value FROM data_aggregates WHERE dataset_id = 10 AND aggregate_function = 'sum';
